member.name: CMSG_CMS_SIGNER_INFO
member.summary: The CMSG_CMS_SIGNER_INFO structure contains the content of the defined SignerInfo in signed or signed and enveloped messages. In decoding a received message, is called for each signer to get a CMSG_CMS_SIGNER_INFO structure.

member.name: CMSG_CMS_SIGNER_INFO.SignerId
member.summary: A structure that identifies the signer's certificate.

member.name: CMSG_CMS_SIGNER_INFO.HashAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that specifies the algorithm used in generating the hash of a message.

member.name: CMSG_CMS_SIGNER_INFO.HashEncryptionAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the hash.

member.name: CMSG_CMS_SIGNER_INFO.EncryptedHash
member.summary: ACRYPT_DATA_BLOB structure that contains the encrypted hash of the message, the signature.

member.name: CMSG_CMS_SIGNER_INFO.AuthAttrs
member.summary: A structure that contains authenticated attributes of the signer.

member.name: CMSG_CMS_SIGNER_INFO.UnauthAttrs
member.summary: A structure that contains unauthenticated attributes of the signer.
